app.title: Australia Visa Condition 8558 Trip Planner
app.description: Help you plan trips and verify compliance with Condition 8558 requirements
app.footer: This tool is for reference only. Please refer to the official Australian Immigration documents for specific visa conditions.

info.title: About Condition 8558
info.description: Condition 8558 is a common restriction on Australian visas that specifies:
info.rule2: The visa holder cannot stay in Australia for more than 12 months
info.rule3: This is a sliding window calculation, on a daily basis
info.note: This tool helps you plan trips and verify compliance with this condition.

disclaimer.title: Application Settings & Disclaimer
disclaimer.officialDefinition: The Australian Department of Home Affairs does not provide strict mathematical definitions for "18 months" and "12 months", allowing immigration judges greater discretion.
disclaimer.appDefinition: For calculation purposes, this application defines 12 months as 365 days and 18 months as 548 days.
disclaimer.entryExitRule: Both entry and exit days are counted as time spent in Australia.
disclaimer.warning: This tool is for reference only and does not constitute legal advice. Please consult a professional migration agent or lawyer for accurate legal guidance.

alerts.endAfterStart: End date must be after start date
alerts.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.

validation.exitAfterEntry: Exit date must be after or equal to entry date
validation.outsideVisaPeriod: Trip is outside visa validity period
validation.violation: Violates Condition 8558 on {{date}} (exceeds 12 months within 18 months)

alerts.enterDates: Please enter entry and exit dates
alerts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this trip?
alerts.entryOutOfVisa: Entry date is not within visa validity period
alerts.cannotEntry: Cannot enter on this date, window full or trip conflict
